title: K-12 Inquiry-Based e-Learning Program for Enhancing Digital Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and foundational knowledge of secondary-level science curriculum
context.additional_context: Blended e-learning environment for digital literacy education integrated with science curriculum. Learners engage in project-based learning by utilizing management skills acquired in office settings. Digital devices are provided by the institution.

learning_goals: Learners can critically evaluate science-related online information sources, select credible materials, and utilize them for digital content creation.
Learners can design and share interactive science education games using web-based tools.
Learners can operate peer feedback systems using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Google Workspace) during project execution.

resources: Web Game Development Platform (Scratch/Construct) Access Permissions

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
